title: Hugo's - West Hollywood
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Italian, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Same menu as other Hugo's in the LA area, it's vegetarian and vegan friendly. Has a vegan carbonara, vegan mac and cheese, veggie burger that can also be added to spaghetti, and marinated tofu. Organic eggs, beans, rice. Full service bar. Tranquil design with fountains and mountain view.
